alert.note: Alert for Brown; Clark; Codington; Day; Deuel; Edmunds; Faulk; Grant; Hamlin; Hand; Marshall; McPherson; Roberts; Spink (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 15 at 8:57AM MST until December 16 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central and northeast South Dakota and west central Minnesota. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Thursday. For the Dense Fog Advisory, until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...As cold air pushes in, rain will change over to snow. The cold air will freeze the wet surfaces and could create icy conditions. Therefore, the combination of ice, snow, and wind could create difficult travel conditions.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
